plot: Max's mom never has enough time. In a strange pawn shop on the edge town, Max finds a man who buys and sells time of all varieties, but getting "enough time" will cost her more than she anticipated.
title: Tick Tock Time Emporium
plot_es: Max's mom never has enough time. In a strange pawn shop on the edge town, Max finds a man who buys and sells time of all varieties, but getting "enough time" will cost her more than she anticipated.
plot_en: Max's mom never has enough time. In a strange pawn shop on the edge town, Max finds a man who buys and sells time of all varieties, but getting "enough time" will cost her more than she anticipated.
